revised_title: An Investigation into the Variation of Angles in Crystals: A Focus on Potassium Alum and Ammonium Alum
tldr: The author investigates the variations in angles observed in crystals, particularly potassium alum and ammonium alum. They explore the causes of these variations and their impact on the law of rational indices, which is the foundation of crystallography. The author also examines the role of optical anomalies and birefringence in cubic systems and suggests that studying the life history of crystals can provide insights into their internal structure and conditions of equilibrium.
